seo.title: CeSIUM - Computer Engineering Student Center at UMinho
seo.description: O CeSIUM é um Centro de estudantes de Engenharia Informática da Universidade do Minho composto por alunos voluntários que têm como objectivo principal representar e promover o curso. É um núcleo unido e dinâmico capaz de proporcionar experiências únicas e enriquecedoras para a tua futura vida profissional.

projects.title: Projects | CeSIUM
projects.description: Estes são os projetos desenvolvidos pelo CeSIUM.

partners.title: Partners | CeSIUM
partners.description: Estas são as parcerias do CeSIUM.

events.title: Events | CeSIUM
events.description: Estes são os eventos dinamizados pelo CeSIUM.

become_a_collaborator.title: Become a Collaborator | CeSIUM
become_a_collaborator.description: Conhece as vantagens de te tornares nosso colaborador.

become_a_member.title: Become a Member | CeSIUM
become_a_member.description: Conhece as vantagens de te tornares nosso sócio.

cesium: CeSIUM - Computer Engineering Student Center at UMinho

name: Center for
Open Source Support
caos.description: Responsible for all software development associated with CeSIUM, including platforms that directly serve the organization and its events, as well as platforms that are useful for students.

name: Department of
Marketing and Content
dmc.description: The DMC is responsible for promoting activities and managing CeSIUM's social media presence - essentially handling all of CeSIUM's marketing. Their work primarily focuses on CeSIUM's visual design and written communications.

name: Department of
External Relations and Merch
drem.description: DREM is the department that establishes and maintains partnerships that CeSIUM members can benefit from, as well as managing communications with all external entities. They're also responsible for creating merchandise for all our students.

name: Educational
Department
ped.description: The Educational Department is in charge of organizing educational activities such as study sessions, lectures, workshops, and more, helping students with their studies and promoting interest in various areas of Computer Science.

name: Recreational
Department
rec.description: The Recreational Department organizes fun and social activities aimed at bringing students together and enhancing their academic experience. Activities range from sports competitions to game tournaments, academic parties, social gatherings, and much more.

collaborate_card.title: Become a collaborator
collaborate_card.text: You can join these departments and contribute to making your organization work.

member_card.title: Become a member
member_card.text: Participate in all our events for free and enjoy tons of other benefits.

team.title: Team
team.description: These are some of the members of our team, from the presidency to the department heads, general assembly, and fiscal council.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: From SEI - the Computer Engineering Week, an annual activity that connects students to innovations and companies - to CoderDojo - which brings programming to the younger generation - CeSIUM creates and participates in various projects. Discover them here.

card.mobile_description: Held annually at the Gualtar campus of the University of Minho, it combines technological innovations with industry experts for students.
card.desktop_description: The Computer Engineering Week is held annually at the Gualtar campus of the University of Minho, aiming to combine the latest technological innovations with the best industry experts to offer a fantastic program to our students.

card.mobile_description: An annual programming competition where participants have 48 hours to develop a project.
card.desktop_description: The Bugsbyte Hackathon is an annual programming competition in which participants have 48 hours to work as a team and develop a technological project focused on an entrepreneurial and impactful solution.

card.mobile_description: A global, volunteer-driven, non-profit movement that aims to teach children and young people aged 7 to 17 how to program.
card.desktop_description: CoderDojo Braga is part of a global, volunteer-driven, non-profit movement that aims to teach children and young people aged 7 to 17 how to program. This project seeks to demonstrate how programming can be a force for positive change in the world.

departments.title: Departments
departments.description: The departments at CeSIUM handle various aspects of the organization, from event planning and partnership management to communication and software development.

participate.title: Participate
participate.description: Participate in all our events for free and enjoy tons of other benefits.

member_kit.title: Member Kit
member_kit.description: You can join these departments and contribute to making your organization work.

room_acess.title: Room Access
room_acess.description: You can access our room and use our resources.

represent.title: Represent
represent.description: You can represent CeSIUM in events and competitions.

discounts.title: Discounts
discounts.description: You can get discounts on our store and with our partners.

events.title: Events
events.warning: Check other months to see more events. This page only includes CeSIUM events. For more events, such as tests or deadlines, visit the [Calendarium](https://calendario.cesium.pt). To stay updated, follow our [Instagram](https://instagram.com/cesiuminho).
events.weekDays: Sun, Mon, Tue, Wed, Thu, Fri, Sat
events.noEvents: There are no events to display.

perks.description: **Desconto de 10%** em compras superiores a 7€, exceto quartas e domingos.
**Desconto de 0,50€** em todos os menus confecionados.

**Oferta de bebida** nos menus Hambúrguer Especial, Tosta Americana, Tosta de Salmão e Cachorro Especial.

**Fanta, Nestea, Água, Sprite, Ginger ale**
**10% de desconto** na compra de jogos de tabuleiro e isenção de consumo mínimo.
**Desconto de 40€** na carta de condução da Categoria B.
Na compra de 8 pins, é **oferecido o pin** de menor valor.
**Portes de envio gratuitos** em compras superiores a 12,50€.
**Desconto de 5€** em todas as atividades (música, dança, artes marciais, teatro, etc).
Na compra do traje, **oferta de mais 3 emblemas** (para além dos 4 habituais).
**Desconto de 0,40€** no menu estudante e nas pizzas.
**Oferta de café** na compra de um menu.
